price: Reče: “Gospodar naš je Onaj Koji je svemu onome što je stvorio dao ono što mu je potrebno, zatim ga kako da se time koristi nadahnuo.”
arabic: قَالَ رَبُّنَا ٱلَّذِيٓ أَعۡطَىٰ كُلَّ شَيۡءٍ خَلۡقَهُۥ ثُمَّ هَدَىٰ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbunā alladhī aʿṭā kulla shayin khalqahu thumma hadā
